[Unit]
Description = Shapelets Server
After = network.target

[Service]
Type = simple 
WorkingDirectory= $working_dir
ExecStart = $python_exe -m shapelets server run 
User = $user
Group = $group
Restart = on-failure 
StandardOutput=syslog
StandardError=syslog
SyslogIdentifer = $sys_log_id
RestartSec = 5
TimeoutStartSec = infinity 

[Install]
WantedBy = multi-user.target
